# PED::SET_HEAD_BLEND_PALETTE_COLOR

## Summary
Sets a custom mp ped palette color

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT** red
* **INT** green
* **INT** blue
* **INT** color = 0

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
p4 seems to vary from 0 to 3.
Preview: https://gfycat.com/MaleRareAmazonparrot
